data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Sliven, Bulgaria to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sliven, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sliven to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Sliven.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, move the 3,618 believers in the state of Sliven to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Bulgarian-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 3,618 believers living in the state of Sliven. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 178,981 people in Sliven who are far from you. Please add 36 new house churches this year.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sliven, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
